subject: Re: [junit] How can I test an Exception
msgSnippet: ... http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?JavaUnitBestPractices Or the book _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 2.8. Good luck. -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Let s write software that
messageBody:
Weiming YIN wrote:

> I am a frech man of Junit, and I have a question.
> How can I test a case which I want it throws an exception.
>
> How can I test the Exception is the one I expected.

http://c2.com/cgi/wiki?JavaUnitBestPractices

Or the book _JUnit Recipes_, recipe 2.8.

Good luck.
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Let's write software that people understand
Diaspar Software Services :: http://www.diasparsoftware.com
